New Records: Nick Castellanos hit his 20th home run of the season
Key Match Events: Weston Wilson drove in the tiebreaking run with an infield single
Pre-Game Insights: Edwin Uceta was suspended for three games after intentionally hitting Nick Castellanos
Post-Match Reflections: Nick Castellanos expressed respect for Tampa Bay manager Kevin Cash for apologizing
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rays' request for a hit by play was denied
